Description_lang: Upon reaching $s1% health remaining, Mordretha conjures Echoes of Carnage for the remainder of the encounter. Echoes of Carnage inflicts $s3 Shadow damage to all players instantly and $339759s1 Shadow damage every $t2 sec thereafter. Ghostly Combatants are periodically drawn to the arena while Echoes of Carnage is in effect.
AuraDescription_lang: Inflicting $339759s1 Shadow damage every $t2 sec to all players.
